content: Yes, there are admission fees for visiting some of the top tourist attractions in Bhubaneswar such as Lingaraj Temple, Mukteswara Temple, Khandagiri and Udayagiri Caves, Dhauli Shanti Stupa, and Odisha State Museum. The admission fees may vary for Indian nationals and foreign tourists. It is advisable to check the official website of the attraction or inquire beforehand.
